== Kanayannur (CT) (628013) ==

Kanayannur (CT) is a town in the [[Kanayannur]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 7.38 sq. km. and harbouring 2346 households with total population of 9308 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 5 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 220 km. Male population is 4622 and female population is 4686. Scheduled Caste population is 1160 and Scheduled Tribes population is 26. Census Location Code of the town is 628013<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 18 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 18 km. Railway station is at Kureekkad at a distance of 2 km.
